trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides an attribute that compares two properties.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The property to compare with the current property.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the property to compare with the current property.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the display name of the other property.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The display name of the other property.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that indicates whether the attribute requires validation context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the attribute requires validation context; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Applies formatting to an error message, based on the data field where the error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the field that caused the validation failure.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether a specified object is valid.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object that contains information about the validation request.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x
